name: Beck, Appellant, v. Stanley Company of America

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Beck, Appellant, v. Stanley Company of America.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Crumlish.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Ward C. Henry, with him Herbert A. Barton and Swartz, Campbell & Henry, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Beck, Appellant, v. Stanley Company of America.
Argued November 29, 1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
I. C. Cordon Forster, with him Joseph F. M. Bald%, 2nd, for appellant.
Ward C. Henry, with him Herbert A. Barton and Swartz, Campbell & Henry, for appellee.
January 6, 1947:
